title: High School Degree
description: During my formative academic years, I attended Basic Education High School (BEHS) (2) Insein, where I completed my education from Grade 6 to Grade 11

title: Bachelor Degree of Technology University Hmawbi (Myanmar)
description: Back in the days i used to be a Civil Engineering Student at Technology University Hmawbi, reaching the third year. Unfortunately, due to Covid-19 pademic and political unrest in my country, I was unable to obtain my degree. Yet I must thank the pademic for bringing me time that I can find out what I wanted to do with my life.

title: Auston University (Singapore)
description: I pursued a HND Diploma specializating in Infrastructure and Networking at Auston University, where I developed a solid foundation in designing, implementing, and managing robust IT infrastructures. My academic journey was marked by excellence, as I achieved Grade A in four core subjects, reflecting my strong technical aptitude and dedication to learning.

title: NCC Level 4 Diploma in Computing (UK)
description: I recently achieved another diploma in the computing field by passing the NCC Level 4 Computing Diploma with flying colors.

title: European International University  (FRANCE)
description: After pursuing for the Bachelor of Science Degree for years, I am proud to tell you that I have got my B.SC-(IT) endosed by French Ministry of Education scoring First Division in all eight subjects. ( I DEVELOPED A COMPILER FOR THE FINAL SCHOOL PROJECT )
